name: Lemon Verbena-Blueberry Muffins
author: SIXMITTS
summary: Lemon verbena smells fabulous in the garden and can be dried for potpourri, but it is fragrant and tasty in baked goods as well.
ingredients: ⅓ cup chopped fresh lemon verbena
directions: Preheat an oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups, or line pan with paper muffin liners
Whisk together the egg, milk, and vanilla extract until smooth; set aside
Place the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and lemon verbena into a food processor
Pulse until the lemon verbena has been finely chopped
Add the butter, and pulse quickly until finely chopped
Pour the flour mixture into a mixing bowl, and stir in the blueberries
Pour in the milk mixture, and stir until just moistened
Fill the prepared muffin cups 3/4 full
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and the tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 20 minutes
